revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: "(Column) 59:;Isidora, daughter of Mysthes (Sabeinos, inspector of boundaries);;(in left margin: drachmas 8 obols 23) orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachma 1 obols 5 chalki 2, naubion obol 1 chalki 2, surcharges obols 2.5;;eparourion drachmas 2 obols 3, surcharges obol 1 chalki 2, kollybos 0.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 5 obols 2;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 4 obols 4 chalki 2, surcharges obol 1.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 5;;Ptolemaios, son of Satabous, grandson of Horos, mother Theonis, drachmas 4;;Lucia Antonia (Bamesis);;naubion of katoikoi for the 13th year obols 4.5, surcharges obol 0.5, kollybos chalki 2, in total obols 5 chalki 2;;and Thaesis, daughter of Pakysis;;likewise obol 1.5, surcharges chalki 2, kollybos chalki 2, in total obols 2;;Ammonous, daughter of Pabous, through the agency of Syros (a dyer);;(in left margin: drachmas 24 obols 10) orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 5, tax on the produce of olives obols 4 chalki 2, naubion obols 3, surcharges drachma 1 obol 1.5 chalki 2;;eparourion drachmas 3 obols 2, surcharges obol 1.5 chalki 2, kollybos obol 1 chalki 2, in total drachmas 11 obol 1.5 chalki 2;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 12 obols 3, surcharges obols 4.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 13 obol 1.5 chalki 2;;in total for the day drachmas 128 obols 26.;Pachon 1:;Thaisas, daughter of Onnophris (Naaraus, son of Nasses);;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 12 obols 3, surcharges obols 4.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 13 obol 1.5 chalki 2;;Soeris, daughter of Petsiris (Abykis, son of Athenis);;(in left margin: drachmas 24 obols 10) orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 5, tax on the produce of olives obols 4 chalki 2, naubion obols 3, surcharges drachma 1 obol 1.5;;eparourion drachmas 3 obols 2, surcharges obol 1.5 chalki 2, kollybos obol 1 chalki 2, in total drachmas 11 obol 1.5 chalki 2;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 12 obols 3, surcharges obols 4.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 13 obol 1.5 chalki 2;;Anchophis, son of Anchophis, grandson of Petheus, mother Taorsenouphis, copper drachmas 8;;Petesouchos, son of Petaus, grandson of Petaus, mother Thaesis, copper drachmas 8;;Harpochration, son of Posis through the agency of Ptolemais (Paouet) Titiale;;orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 5 obols 4.5 chalki 2, taxes for the produce of olives obols 5 chalki 2, naubion obols 3.5, surcharges drachma 1 obols 2.5 chalki 2;;(in left margin: drachmas 28 obols 10) eparourion drachmas 4, surcharges obols 2, kollybos obol 1.5, in total drachmas 13 obol 1.5 chalki 2;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 14 obols 3, surcharges obols 5.5, in total drachmas 15 obols 2;;in total for the day drachmas 84 obols 3.;Pachon 3:;Didymion, son of Heras, grandson of Pekmeis, mother Tasoucharion;;guards tax drachmas 12 obols 16;;Herakleia, daughter of Theon (Titinamse);;orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 4 obol 1, tax on the produce of olives obols 4.5, naubion obols 2.5, surcharges drachma 1 obol 0.5;;eparourion drachmas 2 obols 2.5 chalki 2, surcharges obol 1.5, kollybos obol 1, in total drachmas 9 obols 3.5 chalki 2;;(in left margin: drachmas 24 obols 14) geometria for the 12th year drachmas 10 obols 2 chalki 2, surcharges obols 4, drachmas 11 chalki 2;;naubion of katoikoi for the 13th year drachmas 2 obols 3, surcharges obol 1.5, kollybos obol 0.5, in total drachmas 2 obols 5;;tax on land plots in release likewise obols 5 chalki 2, surcharges obol 1 chalki 2, kollybos chalki 2, in total drachma 1 obol 0.5 chalki 2:;in total for the day drachmas 40 obol 1."

listBibl.bibl: Rep Editor - Pearl OM; Rep Ser. - Diss; 1938; pg. 9 - 10 Youtie HC, PMich IV, 1, 224, 1937 Pearl OM - Youtie HC, PMich IV, 357 C, D, 1939
